ygData.subject: RE: Stealth patching (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... t normally maps to /tell, which I find useless because you can abbreviate it with /t.  I ve remapped it to y .  My r will then be mapped to t
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> just when i FINALLY got used to hitting 'e' to auto-run instead of 'r' i
> have the choice of switching it back. what to do! i've gotten used to
> hitting 'r' to reply too, i may just leave it hehe.

:-)

't' normally maps to /tell, which I find useless because you
can abbreviate it with /t. I've remapped it to 'y'. My 'r'
will then be mapped to 't' (currently autorun since it uses
the same finger as 'r'). And my autorun will go back to 'r'
for "run."

Now I wish they'd add an abbreviation for /guildsay, and make
/s default to /say instead of /split. I don't know anyone who
uses /split more than once a week, while /say I use several
times an hour. Why they made /s map to /split is beyond me.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
